metadata.title: CVE-2024-26328 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in QEMU 7.1.0 through 8.2.1. register_vfs inhw/pci/pcie_sriov.c does not set NumVFs to PCI_SRIOV_TOTAL_VF, and thusinteraction with hw/nvme/ctrl.c is mishandled.

criterions.comment: qemu package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
